# Wiki

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Wiki is to connect to the dbpedia API and clean the data.

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("arreen/wiki")
library(wiki)
```

## Example

For more information look at the vignette:

```{r example}
vignette("Wiki")

```
